author: Special Correspondent
text:
Posters displayed at DJ Academy of Design, in the city on Wednesday.

DJ Academy of Design has organised an exhibition of contemporary Japanese posters till April 11.

According to a press release, the exhibition, which is curated by the Japan Foundation, showcases 75 high quality posters designed by 15 renowned graphic designers from the Bubble Economy period of Japan. These deal with a range of themes, including environment and culture.

The artists were chosen as they treated poster as social art.

The exhibition is part of an ongoing initiative by DJ Academy of Design to spread design awareness in the public domain.
title: Exhibition of Japanese posters
